content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Young Man’s Fancy, the August 18, 1951, episode from The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe.

(30:30) Our second case is The Death Bed Caper, from The Adventures Of Sam Spade. That story aired June 20, 1948.

Download CaseClosed774

Visit donate.relicradio.com for more information on supporting Case Closed. Your help keeps this show coming every week! Thank you.
